channel.title: Mortimer Adler lectures
channel.description:
Series of five lectures by Dr. Mortimer J. Adler, Director of the Institute for Philosophic Research in Chicago. Title of lecture series: "The Difference of Man and the Difference It Makes."

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Man and brute, part 1
item.description: This program presents the first part of Mortimer Adler's lecture, "Man and Brute."
item.dc:creator: Adler, Mortimer Jerome, 1902-2001.
item.dc:subject: Speeches, addresses, etc

item.title: The difference it makes, part 2
item.description: This program presents the second part of Mortimer Adler's lecture, "The Difference It Makes."
item.dc:creator: Adler, Mortimer Jerome, 1902-2001.
item.dc:subject: Speeches, addresses, etc
